attributes.action: Save Bristol and south gold people first
attributes.additional_details: People first has recently shut in Bristol a organisation for people with learning difficulties it is a very well known service for its advocacy and parents group and it's dating agency it really needs government funding to stay open please bring it back to our local community as this is one organisation that people with learning difficulties need even for professionals and students so please sign this petition with a huge heart

rejection.details: It is not clear to which organisation you are referring.
